name: Glitchkour
description:
Your controls are glitch, but you need to use the glitched controls to reach the exit!

Controls for the game:

  • Scroll up - Move forward
  • Scroll down - Move backward
  • Mouse wheel click - Jump
  • Left click - Rotate to the left
  • Right click - Rotate to the right
  • R - Restart the game
  • Esc - Quit the game
